home.home_text3: Information Technology Coordinator - Support & Infrastructure - B.S. Computer Engineering (in progress)
home.home_summary: Information Technology engineer experienced in enterprise infrastructure, Active Directory, and VMware ESXi virtualization. I lead support operations, server administration, backup policies, and data center optimization. Currently studying Computer Engineering at CEUTEC while continuing training in web development and networking.

sobre-mi.title: Professional Profile
sobre-mi.subtitle: Summary
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: Information Technology engineer focused on technical support, server administration, security implementation, and data center operations. Expert in Active Directory and VMware ESXi virtualization with experience migrating and maintaining virtual machines. Currently pursuing Computer Engineering at CEUTEC and continuously training in web development, computer science, and networking through Platzi, Alura, and Cisco Networking Academy. My goal is to grow as a software engineer and deliver technology solutions that add value to organizations.

formacion.title: Education & training
formacion.tiempo-formacion1: Focus on operating systems, programming, and networking.
formacion.formacion3: Cisco Networking Academy - CCNA: Introduction to Networks

proyectos.title: Professional experience
proyectos.exp1_b2: Overseeing servers, networks, and virtualization platforms.
proyectos.exp2_b1: Comprehensive technical support for corporate clients.
proyectos.exp2_b2: Administration of LAN/WAN networks and servers.
proyectos.exp3_b3: Collaborated on system migrations and infrastructure upgrades.
proyectos.exp4_b1: Specialized technical support for internal and external clients.
proyectos.exp5_role: Infrastructure and Support Technician | May 2017 - Jun 2018
proyectos.exp5_b1: Preventive and corrective maintenance of networks and servers.
proyectos.cert_b2: Git and GitHub: control and share your code.
proyectos.cert_b3: JavaScript on the Web: DOM manipulation.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.text: Fill out the form and I will reach out as soon as possible.
